entry.title: Friday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers becoming mixed with flurries this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
